Room.Name: Leviathan Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Leviathan Drive, just west of Riverdell Park.
Room.LongDescription: The Riverdell Tranquility Park is a large city block, set aside primarily for natural preservation purposes. The large number of trees and shrubs protected by the park makes it an ideal location for rangers of all levels to train in the skills of tracking and searching. On the west is a large weapons and armor retailer. Known as Evander's World of Weapons, the center sells many exotic and rare items. The center must be entered from either the north or south.
